mapper.sql: ID, ROOT, SEQ, NAME, ICON, TITLE, ADDRESS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DELETE
mapper.select: select tmenu.ID, tuser.ID as USER_ID, tmenu.ROOT, tmenu.SEQ, tmenu.NAME, tmenu.ICON, tmenu.TITLE, tmenu.ADDRESS from tuser inner join tauthority on tuser.ROLE_ID = tauthority.ROLE_ID and tauthority.IS_DELETE = '0' inner join tmenu on tauthority.MENU_ID = tmenu.ID and tmenu.ROOT = #{root,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tmenu.IS_DELETE = '0' where tuser.ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tuser.IS_DELETE = '0' order by tmenu.SEQ asc
